as.description: The element or component the Tabs should render as.
as.description_zh: The element or component the Tabs should render as.

onChange.description: A function called whenever the active tab changes.
onChange.description_zh: A function called whenever the active tab changes.

vertical.description:
When true, the orientation of the Tab.List will be vertical, otherwise
it will be horizontal.
vertical.description_zh:
When true, the orientation of the Tab.List will be vertical, otherwise
it will be horizontal.

manual.description:
When true, the user can only display a panel via the keyboard by first
navigating to it using the arrow keys, and then by pressing Enter or
Space. By default, panels are automatically displayed when navigated to
via the arrow keys. Note that this prop has no affect on mouse behavior.
manual.description_zh:
When true, the user can only display a panel via the keyboard by first
navigating to it using the arrow keys, and then by pressing Enter or
Space. By default, panels are automatically displayed when navigated to
via the arrow keys. Note that this prop has no affect on mouse behavior.
